thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient location
thread.title_full: Convenient location - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: mrspatbolesgi
title: Convenient location
text: This hotel was very clean and the room was spacious for a London hotel. A wall plug was not working which made it difficult for three women to dress in the mornings but I failed to report it to the staff. This hotel is very near the "tube" - a major plus. Also the Concierge, Diego & Raj, were outstanding. They are an asset to this company! I also thought the price was reasonable.
